channel.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
channel.description:
There's been a bunch of Discord Servers created for chatting over recent months, but it hasn't always been easy to find the details and they don't always stay active.
If you have an active Discord server, click the **<kbd>EDIT</kbd>** button on this post and add it to the list. If you haven't been here long enough to see the Edit button, then reply in this thread with the details, asking someone to add it to the list for you.
**> DISCORD DIRECTORY:** [AC Community](https://discord.gg/accommunity) Run by Arimyth, Hum4n01d, Ianardo, Zhander, isg, mstar, Xicon, and the community [The Summitt](https://discord.gg/summitt) Run by IXACHI, Zhander & Dylan Jones [UpBeat200 Collective](https://discord.gg/dErkpsXbWk) Run by Bluejy, IXACHI & Sphere [Sylex](https://discord.gg/Hg8yXKG) Run by Hum4n01d, Arimyth, ToxicCaves64, & Ianardo [Aaron Trinh (v.2)](https://discord.gg/fT5UStb) Run by Aaron Trinh, Fadent, Midnight Sky [melo.](https://discord.gg/MkcHscx) (label) Run by SanaB & Arimyth [five.](https://discord.gg/6UYGg4T) Run by sei (surf), Thrashie (Kro), Matik, & Joshua Tu [Cornea Island](https://discord.gg/wQwvN7Q) Run by Cornea and Xiejra [A.R Network](https://discord.gg/BaQsRVB) Run by Indirect and Little Baby [efflux.](https://discord.gg/GxNv8dg) run by mr mooo, cuber, HYDRANS, Peregrihn and mr. serpent [Dissolved Records ](https://discord.gg/NFd5mc3) Run by Twizard and Hexx [REVITALIZE](https://discord.gg/jmp5XEr) run by Vokon [House of Auxy](https://discord.gg/Qtkg5QyFdd) Run by Avory

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]

item.description:
Avro:

I’m really sorry that I almost made you write an essay about…

I thought you said you’re aware of how I do things. You should already be aware that I write ‘essays’ all the time. I apparently have a reputation for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Have you tried posting your in-progress tracks her, in the Work in Progress section, to get feedback?

Work in Progress

Get feedback and collaborate on projects.

Similarly, most or all of the existing Auxy Discord servers have ‘feedback’ channels. One of them — The Auxy Collective — even has regular live feedback ‘shows’, where the hosts review a number of tracks submitted that week and give more detailed feedback, and those listening in also share feedback into the chat. It’s one of the best feedback opportunities I’ve seen in the Auxy space. (Imo, it’s exactly the kind of idea Auxy should have come up with.)

Definitely worth checking out.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]

item.description:
The moment I posted that thread, I knew it was a mistake.
I just didn’t think it will cause quite a reaction.
I thought nobody’s going to care about it.

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: Avro
item.description:
But I really appreciate that you share your opinions with me, you were really just trying to be helpful , I really do appreciate that!

I just got really frustrated when I was working on a track , I didn’t think twice and I made that server. I’m really sorry that I almost made you write an essay about a mistake I made. But still thank you caring about that

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: Avro
item.description:
I created the server only bc I need help with my music. I’m not so good at it. I just wanted to collect a few people and maybe they can help with me. I never wanted a community.

I find my self get really frustrated when I make music sometimes. It’s almost a mental break down.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
I didn’t mean to shut the idea down. Sorry if that’s how it came across. There might be other ways a new Auxy Discord can offer value to the Auxy community and be successful. In fact, it’s very likely a new Auxy Discord would need a ‘unique selling point’ to have a hope of becoming successful…

It’s tricky, the community isn’t huge and it’s likely that most Auxy users aren’t aware of community servers or aren’t interested in joining one.
(If it was more engaged, this forum would likely be more active.)

I’d love to see more innovation around Auxy, so if you believe you can create a new server that brings something new and valuable to the space, I’m all for it.

 

As for those instruments and genres… I probably wish Auxy was better at supporting them more than most, as I’m one of those who tries to work in non-electronic genres in Auxy.
I work a lot — a lot — with the Vintage Keys (epiano/Rhodes) pack, often creating very complex solos or rich jazzy chords. It’s very difficult to add real nuance bc the relative volume levels are very limited, and the sounds a little lacking in character (though Lobby is my constant go-to).

(I sometimes bounce out the MIDI patterns to Ableton to use one of the Rhodes libraries I have and to add some performance nuance using the per-note Velocity controls.)

Auxy is very capable in many ways, but it’s aimed primarily at electronic music producers where you don’t tend to find the depth of performance, nuance and subtlety that help define the genres you mentioned.

A number of possible solutions/enhancements have been proposed by users multiple times, but so far, the Auxy team have shown little interest.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: Avro
item.description:
I’m in Auxy disco for quite a while, I know you and by your personality
I knew this was coming from you as soon as I posted it. : ]
The truth is I knew this was a bad idea, I just know ain’t nobodys gon give a sh*t about it,
but I was having a particular mental breakdown. like I usually do. on a regular basis. and I was like f**k it. Ima do it. Bc I’m f **ked up.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Don’t mean to be a downer, but you’re probably better off joining one of the existing Auxy Discord servers, with an established user community, than starting a new one from scratch.

Avro:

piano, guitar, orchestral

Digital music production in those genres succeeds or fails on the quality of the samples and the level of ‘performance’ and nuance readily achievable in the software. Auxy doesn’t score highly on either count for those instruments and genres, leaving output sounding a bit cheap and quite mechanical/MIDI-locked.

It’s likely why there’s relatively little Auxy music beyond electronic and dance, which is where its capable of creating something more authentic and credible.

 

(Making a new Auxy Discord server dedicated — or leaning towards — to those genres is likely to struggle, precisely bc so few Auxy users work in those genres, for the reasons mentioned above.)

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: Avro
item.description:
Discord

Join the House of Auxy Discord Server!

Check out the House of Auxy community on Discord - hang out with 1 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

if you make genres like house, electronic, disco, even synth-wave, any sort of dance club music!

Also, anything involves piano, guitar, orchestral, etc. or anything acoustic/organic like rock/jazz are welcomed too!

I don’t find a lot of Auxy users make these genres, which I love to make. So I made this server!

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty]
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
It fell out of support and most of the moderators went inactive at some point. It remained open for a while but was mostly used exclusively for spamming / being toxic so Akyut (one of the original moderators) closed it down in favor of redirecting traffic to the actively maintained and active Auxy Collective Discord.
